title: targeted attempt
extract: A target firm is a company that has been chosen as an attractive merger or acquisition option by a potential acquirer. ... When there is opposition to the transaction, the target firm may attempt a variety of hostile actions hoping to thwart the takeover attempt.Feb 27, 2018
extract_html: A target firm is a company that has been chosen as an attractive merger or acquisition option by a potential acquirer. ... When there is opposition to the transaction, the target firm may attempt a variety of hostile actions hoping to thwart the takeover attempt.Feb 27, 2018
